datafile.description: Complete Classic technology data for CivJS (ported from freeciv classic ruleset)

about.name: Complete Classic Technologies Ruleset
about.summary: All 87 technologies from freeciv classic ruleset with full dependency tree and freeciv compatibility

alphabet.name: Alphabet
alphabet.helptext: Allows you to communicate knowledge to your people.

bronze_working.name: Bronze Working
bronze_working.helptext: Enables you to make bronze weapons and tools. Allows Phalanx units.
